testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlNodeInventoryRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.7.1.6 [Need for Roadway Characteristics Data] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N109R234_Restrictions_Supported = ${TMDD_N109R234_Restrictions_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N109R235_Roadway_Network_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N109R235_Roadway_Network_Name_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N109R236_Node_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N109R236_Node_Name_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N109R237_Node_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N109R237_Node_Description_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N109R238_Route_Designator_Supported = ${TMDD_N109R238_Route_Designator_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Direction is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N109R239_Node_Direction_Supported = ${TMDD_N109R239_Node_Direction_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N109R240_Linear_Reference_Supported = ${TMDD_N109R240_Linear_Reference_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N109R241_Node_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N109R241_Node_Type_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Number of Links is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N109R242_Number_of_Links_Supported = ${TMDD_N109R242_Number_of_Links_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.2.1.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N109R243_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N109R243_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}
Step 12 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 14 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 15 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlNodeInventoryRequest REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected
Step 16 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 16.1 IF TMDD_N109R234_Restrictions_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 16.1.1 VERIFY that element restrictions exists within each instance of nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item
Step 16.2 IF TMDD_N109R235_Roadway_Network_Name_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 16.2.1 VERIFY that element network-name exists within each instance of nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-list.node
Step 16.3 IF TMDD_N109R236_Node_Name_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 16.3.1 VERIFY that element node-name exists within each instance of nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-list.node
Step 16.4 IF TMDD_N109R237_Node_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 16.4.1 VERIFY that element node-description exists within each instance of nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-list.node
Step 16.5 IF TMDD_N109R238_Route_Designator_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 16.5.1 VERIFY that element node-route-designator exists within each instance of nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-list.node
Step 16.6 IF TMDD_N109R239_Node_Direction_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 16.6.1 VERIFY that element node-direction exists within each instance of nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-list.node
Step 16.7 IF TMDD_N109R240_Linear_Reference_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 16.7.1 VERIFY that element linear-reference exists within each instance of nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-list.node
Step 16.7.2 VERIFY that element linear-reference-version exists within each instance of nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-list.node
Step 16.8 IF TMDD_N109R241_Node_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 16.8.1 VERIFY that element node-type exists within each instance of nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-list.node
Step 16.9 IF TMDD_N109R242_Number_of_Links_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 16.9.1 VERIFY that element node-links-number exists within each instance of nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-list.node
Step 16.10 IF TMDD_N109R243_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 16.10.1 VERIFY that element last-update-time exists within each instance of nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.organization-information
Step 16.10.2 VERIFY that element last-update-time exists within each instance of nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-list.node
Step 16.11 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content
